column5: Well I am leaving at 4am from Montreal if all goes well I should be launching the boat around 8 am in Deseronto at Mohawk Bay park campground.Looking forward to spending time with GlennK one of our members his Dad Ron and my Buddy Serge.Ron will be in at 10:30 am so I will have my partner for the day  .  It was a rough week my son Ryan(8) wiped out on his skateboard tuesday and now has a hairline fracture on his foot no cast but he is on crutches and should be OK in 3 weeks.Unfortunately no sports for a month.His soccer pratice starts this weekend.It was a stressful week and work so 4 days of fishing will clear my head.  Well hopefully I will have some fish pics and a report when I return Monday.  Good Luck to all who are fishing this weekend and please be safe.  MTP

Wow Mike, sounds like you need this weekend to unwind.  Enjoy your time, the sunrises and sunsets...  Look forward to seeing the pictures when you get back , whether there are fish or not I am sure you will have a wonderful weekend.  Be safe,  Cheers,  Jen
Good Morning to all.This getting up at Lew O'clock is hard on the body.  But whoo hooo fishing is 4 hours away.  MTP
Sounds like you need a break good for you,try fishing around the picton area!!!.  Good luck
Mike, good luck. If I hear of the hot spots I will call you!  You need to hook into a 10lb'er to get the week behind you.  Easton
Good luck Mike, have a good time and catch a beast!  Joey
Mike,  Les poissons sont la - Bonne Peche
Good luck out there!!!  I hope to see a nice report full of nice sized eyes!! Will be waiting for it...
They're hittin hard man go slay em! My brother Martycoo and my Grandfather went out this morning and nailed 8 of em.
